TopicTitle: Anyone know the HyperEdit coordinates for Eve

Articles.Content: I'm trying to use HyperEdit's  lander to put a test rocket on the highest peak of Eve and somehow I keep missing it; when I google it the location,  I get invalid results dated back to 2013.
Well according to the Interplanetary Mountaineer contract pack the highest peak is at: latitude = -25.0159°, longitude = -158.4558°

Thanks. that helped a lot, tho the contract pack is a bit off; that location was on a slope and would be bad to land on, but I did make jeb get out and walk around; found a nice "flat" at the peak,  -24.99388889 LAT, -158.47277778 LON



 

A word of caution however, if you miss this location by the slightest, there's a 3km steep slope you'll have to climb up somehow.

Edited August 31, 2017 by Xyphos
